name: Coloraft
description:
Story: 

You are a man tired of his colorless world he is present in. He has a goal, a goal for seeking color. He has attempted this quest multiple times, but never managed to achieve his goal. No one has believed he can find color in his village .The man has almost lost hope in his aim but one day, he said he was gonna attempt it one last time. The power is in your hands. Help this man achieve his long lasting goal of finding color in this dull world.

Movement:

Arrow keys to move. 

Space to interact with objects.
